 2016-01262016-03-11HC,  PHAC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Health Act
SubjectPotable Water on Board Trains, Vessels, Aircraft and Buses Regulations
PrecisPOTABLE WATER ON BOARD TRAINS, VESSELS, AIRCRAFT AND BUSES REGULATIONS in order to (1) protect the public by mitigating risks associated with water supplied to passengers while travelling on conveyances; and (2) modernize requirements for potable water supplied to passengers on board conveyances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0043 Publication Date: 2016-03-23
AttachmentsAttachment
